title: Juan Montiel
text: Juan Carlos Montiel (born November 12, 1965 in <a href="Montevideo">Montevideo</a>) is a retired male <a href="boxing">boxer</a> from <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>. He competed for his native country at the <a href="1988%20Summer%20Olympics">1988 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Seoul%2C%20South%20Korea">Seoul, South Korea</a>, and won a bronze medal at the <a href="1987%20Pan%20American%20Games">1987 Pan American Games</a> during his career as an amateur. Nicknamed "Tito" he made his professional debut on October 15, 1993, defeating <a href="Luiz%20Augusto%20Ferreira">Luiz Augusto Ferreira</a>.
